response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This product, which I believe is worth significantly more than its face value, has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled benefits. I am offering it to you at a special price of $2,000,000, which I believe reflects its true worth and provides you with a remarkable investment opportunity.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or would like to discuss the product further, I am more than happy to provide additional information. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 2000000}
